name: FightingAmphibians
description:
Update 9/2/2010 Made the front page and navigation bar look a bit better. Edit: Fixed highlighted posts being transparent and unreadable.


You can change the background image to any of your choosing.  Here's a picture of the gradient: http://imgur.com/ETSKp.jpg

Premade BGs:
http://imgur.com/OcIwG.jpg - default frog
http://imgur.com/GIAJZ.jpg - kawaii frog
http://imgur.com/lcJg5.jpg - cartoon frog
http://imgur.com/FBPj2.jpg - warm frog

Code taken from style 25109 and style 35514.
